content:
isaacvetter edited Issue #297(assigned to isaacvetter)

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 91

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Quick Start
Section: Building an EHR Service
Type: A-T :pencil2:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

A non secured FHIR server is important to support testing with a CDS Service.

Proposed Wording:

A non-secured FHIR server is important to support testing with a CDS Service.

Comment:
Everywhere else in the doc there is a hyphen between "non" and "secured" (e.g., "non-secured", not "non secured")

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._
